name: Chesster
description: Chess meets match-three to create a deep and strategic new experience. Faced with a board full of chess pieces, you must create rows or columns of matching pieces to score points. Pieces move the same way as in chess and “take” the piece in their target destination, clearing it from the board.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A very interesting take on an old time Gold classic. At this price it is well worth it. Well realized and interesting graphical art surroudings.
